allow_origins.description:
AllowOrigins is a list of allowed origin to indicate whether the response can be shared with
requesting code from the given origin

cookie_insecure.description:
CookieInsecure allows CSRF cookie to be sent to servers that the browser considers
unsecured. Useful for cases where the connection is secured via VPN rather than
HTTPS directly.

config.CORS.description: CORS settings for the server to allow cross origin requests

debug.description: Debug enables debug mode for the server

dev.description: Dev enables echo's dev mode options

listen.description: Listen sets the listen address to serve the echo server on

shutdown_grace_period.description: ShutdownGracePeriod sets the grace period for in flight requests before shutting down

read_timeout.description: ReadTimeout sets the maximum duration for reading the entire request including the body

write_timeout.description: WriteTimeout sets the maximum duration before timing out writes of the response

idle_timeout.description: IdleTimeout sets the maximum amount of time to wait for the next request when keep-alives are enabled

read_header_timeout.description: ReadHeaderTimeout sets the amount of time allowed to read request headers

tls.description: TLS contains the tls configuration settings

cors.description: CORS contains settings to allow cross origin settings and insecure cookies

config.Server.description: Server settings for the echo server

enabled.description: Enabled turns on TLS settings for the server

cert_file.description: CertFile location for the TLS server

cert_key.description: CertKey file location for the TLS server

auto_cert.description: AutoCert generates the cert with letsencrypt, this does not work on localhost

config.TLS.description: TLS settings for the server for secure connections

debug.description: debug enables printing the debug database logs

database_name.description: the name of the database to use with otel tracing

multi_write.description: enables writing to two databases simultaneously

secondary_db_source.description: dsn of the secondary database if multi-write is enabled

refresh_interval.description: RefreshInterval determines how often to reload the config

server.description: Server contains the echo server settings

db.description: DB contains the database configuration for the ent client

redis.description: Redis contains the redis configuration for the key-value store

tracer.description: Tracer contains the tracing config for opentelemetry

sessions.description: Sessions config for user sessions and cookies

description: Config contains the configuration for the datum server
